Description: ProsperWorks is the #1 CRM for G Suite. It is embedded into Gmail so you can update opportunities, add contacts, and manage your pipeline right from your inbox.
Name: Prosperworks

Methods.Name: Update Person
Methods.Description: This method allows you to update a People.

Methods.Name: Delete Person
Methods.Description: This method allows you to delete a Person.

Methods.Name: Get Person By Id
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of a single Person by specifying a Person ID

Methods.Name: Create Person
Methods.Description: This method allows you to add a Person.

Methods.Name: Get Person By Email
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of a single Person by specifying a Person Email Address

Methods.Name: Get People
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all People.
